DOC.brief_title: Comparative Efficacy Study Action Observation Therapy Mirror Therapy After Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: In 3-year study project , investigator design comparative , randomize control trial ( 1 ) investigate treatment efficacy AOT , MT versus control intervention motor functional outcome stroke patient , ( 2 ) compare mechanisms change cortical neural activity AOT , MT , control intervention use magnetoencephalography ( MEG ) , ( 3 ) determine correlation neural activation change clinical outcome AOT MT , ( 4 ) identify potential good responder AOT MT . An estimated total 90 patient subacute stroke recruit study . All participant randomly assign receive AOT , MT , control intervention 3-week training period ( total 15 session ) . Outcome measure conduct baseline , immediately treatment , 3 month follow-up . For MEG study , investigator anticipate recruit 12 15 patient group . The patient still participate study receive treatment clinical evaluation even meet MEG eligibility criterion willing participate MEG study .
